title: Firefox OS
content: Firefox OS[4] (project name: Boot to Gecko, also known as B2G)[5] is a discontinued open-source operating system –  made for smartphones,[6] tablet computers,[7] smart TVs,[8] and dongles designed by Mozilla and external contributors. It is based on the rendering engine of the Firefox web browser, Gecko, and on the Linux kernel. It was first commercially released in 2014.
